name: Coinbase Token Swap Service
description: Swap tokens for using Coinbase API

CLIENT_ID.description: Client ID of your Coinbase application. Find it at https://www.coinbase.com/settings/api

CLIENT_SECRET.description: Client Secret of your Coinbase application. Find it at https://www.coinbase.com/settings/api

CLIENT_REDIRECT_URL.description: A registered redirect URL for your Coinbase application. Set it at https://www.coinbase.com/settings/api
